statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Freshman Maurice Jones scored 29 points as Southern Cal beat Santa Clara 86-73 on Monday night.
article.headline: Freshman Maurice Jones powers USC past Santa Clara
article.linkText: Freshman Jones powers USC past Santa Clara
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- Freshman Maurice Jones scored 29 points as Southern Cal beat Santa Clara 86-73 on Monday night. Nikola Vucevic had 20 points and 10 rebounds while Bryce Jones added 15 points for the Trojans, who are 2-0 for just the second time in 10 seasons. Kevin Foster led the Broncos (1-1) with 26 points, and Marc Trasolini added 15. USC trailed 52-51 before Maurice Jones scored eight points during a 15-5 run to help the Trojans put the Broncos away. USC made six of 11 3-pointers and shot 57.4 percent from the field. Alex Stepheson, who fractured his left hand in the Trojans' opener against UC Irvine on Sunday, played with a black cast and finished with six points and seven rebounds. Maurice Jones scored 13 of his points in the first half to help USC take a 39-34 lead at intermission.
